homeHeader.title: From Idea to Prototype to Market — Innovate Breakthrough Technologies in Dubai Silicon Oasis Free Zone with One Nexuz
homeHeader.description: Struggling to meet DSO’s innovation-centric licensing criteria, multiple business plan rejections, or insufficient visa quotas? At One Nexuz, our skilled consultants simplify all the documentation and bureaucracy, accelerating license and visa issuance and reducing your time-to-market. Launch in a global innovation hub to tap into DSO Free Zone's innovative infrastructure, a thriving technology ecosystem, and zero personal or corporate income taxes!

leftSection_1.title: Why Tech Experts Choose Dubai Silicon Oasis Free Zone
leftSection_1.description: Take advantage of DSO's strategic location to gain international connectivity via the Dubai International Airport, Port Rashid, and Jebel Ali Port. Drive business growth with the Free Zone's hi-tech ecosystem, ready-made offices, and modern amenities.

leftSection_5.title: How We Simplify Dubai Silicon Oasis Free Zone Company Formation

items.title: Choose a Legal Structure
items.description: We'll start with a brief consultation to determine your business goals and suggest the best-fit company registration form.

items.title: Finalise a Business Name
items.description: Next, our experts will help you select and reserve a unique trade name and identify the ideal business activity.

items.title: Prepare Your Documents
items.description: We'll help you compile and submit the required documents and complete paperwork to streamline company formation in DSO.

items.title: Collect Your License
items.description: Once the DSO Authority approves your application, we'll issue your trade license, empowering you to start operating.

items.title: Set Up Your Bank Account
items.description: Lastly, we'll connect you with a trusted bank partner to open a personal or corporate account to simplify business financing.

leftSection_8.title: What Customers Are Saying about One Nexuz
leftSection_8.description: Learn what customers are saying about One Nexuz.

items.quote: I had heard horror stories about delays and hidden fees, but my DSO license was ready in just 5 days exactly as quoted. The team handled every step and even secured my bank account in under a week.
Setting up remotely seemed risky, but I didn’t have to fly in until my Emirates ID appointment. Everything from document submission to visa stamping was seamless and transparent.
They explained every cost upfront and there were zero surprises. We went from business idea to operational in 8 days, with all 4 visas processed on time.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What are the benefits of setting up in Dubai Silicon Oasis?
items.answer: The Dubai Silicon Oasis Free Zone empowers entrepreneurs and business owners with state-of-the-art infrastructure, modern tech facilities, innovative incubators, and strategic access to international markets.

items.question: Do I need to have a local partner to launch my DSO company?
items.answer: No, DSO FZ offers expats 100% strategic ownership of their company alongside full capital and profit repatriation.

items.question: How many activities can I bundle on my trade license in DSO?
items.answer: You can bundle 3-7 business activities, depending on your chosen Free Zone license and legal structure.

items.question: Is physical presence necessary to set up a business in Dubai Silicon Oasis?
items.answer: No, our experts offer completely remote business setup solutions, empowering you to get started from any corner of the world.

items.question: Does One Nexuz offer assistance for opening a DSO corporate bank account?
items.answer: Yes, our skilled business specialists can help you set up a corporate bank account linked to your DSO company for seamless financing.
